channel.title: SevenAtSevenLastSection
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenLastSection, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Summery New Historical Fiction for June
item.description: Jam-pack your summer reading with these great new historical fiction books coming out in June.

item.title: This Appalachian Historical Fiction Has a Forgotten Kingdom in North Carolina
item.description: The main character here learns that her ancestral home was once a part of a kingdom—where her ancestor was queen.

item.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for June 4, 2025
